<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Castoroides](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1772)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Castoroides are bear-sized beavers that build their lodges on land near a water source rather than in the water.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Castoroides.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Castoroides](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1772)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +10; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Deep Breath** A castoroides can [hold its breath](/Rules.aspx?ID=468) for 1 hour.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 45

**Slap** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The castoroides is targeted by a physical ranged Strike from an attacker it can see; **Effect** The castoroides swats at the projectile with its wide tail, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to its AC against the triggering attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12,
**Damage** 2d6+4 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Construct Shelter** <actions string="Three Actions" />  The beaver takes 1 minute to rapidly construct a simple mound along one side of its space, which can be used to [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90).

**Penetrating Bite** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The beaver makes a jaws Strike. The Strike ignores the first 5 Hardness of organic materials, such as rope, leather, and wood.

**Prop** <actions string="Single Action" />  The beaver stabilizes itself with its tail, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to its Fortitude and Reflex DCs against [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) and [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) attempts until it next takes an action with the [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) trait.

**Gouge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The castoroides deals 2d8 piercing damage to a creature it has [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) (DC 20 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save). A creature that fails its save also takes 1d4 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-300" />
name: Castoroides
